pages.text: wanh khalaq alzwjyn: aldhikr walantha min al'iinsan walhywan, min nutfat tusabb fi alrhm
wanh khalaq alzwjyn: aldhikr walantha min al'iinsan walhywan, min nutfat tusabb fi alrhm
wan ealaa rabik -ayha alrswl- 'iieadat khalaqahum baed mmathm, wahi alnash'at al'ukhraa yawm alqyamt
wanh hu aghna man sha' min khalaqah balmal, wmllakh lahum wardahm bh
wanh subhanah wteala hu rabu alshshiera, wahu najam mdy', kan bed 'ahl aljahiliat yebdwnh min dun allh

wanh subhanah wteala 'ahlak eadana alawla, wahum qawm hwd, wa'ahlak thmwd, wahum qawm salh, falam yubq minhum ahdana, wa'ahlak qawm nuh qblu. hwla' kanuu 'ashada tmrdana wa'aezam kfrana min aladhin jawu min bedhm. wmdayn qawm lut qalbiha allah elyhm, wajaeal ealiaha saflha, falbsha ma albsha min alhjart

fbay nem rabik elyk- 'ayuha al'iinsan almkdhb- tashuk?
hdha muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm, nadhir bialhaqi aldhy 'andhir bih al'anbia' qblh, falays bbde min alrsl
qrbt alqiamat wdna wqtha, la ydfeha 'idhana min dun allah ahd, wala yattalie ealaa waqt wqweha 'iilaa allh

w'in yar almushrikun dalilana wbrhanana ealaa sidq alrasul muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm, yuerdu ean al'iiman bih wtsdyqh mukadhibin mnkryn, wyqwlu baed zuhur aldlyl: hdha sihr batl dhahib mdmhl la dwam lh
wkdhdhabu alnabiu salaa allah ealayh wslm, watabaeuu dalalatihim wama dethm 'iilayh ahwawhm min altkdhyb, wkll 'amr min khayr 'aw sharun waqie bi'ahlih yawm alqiamat eind zuhur althawab waleqab
wlqd ja' kafaar quraysh min 'anba' al'umam almkdhbt brslha, wama hll biha min aledhab, ma fih kifayat lrdehm ean kufruhum wdlalhm
hdha alquran aldhy ja'ahum hikmat ezymt balighat ghaytha, fa'aya shay' tughni alnudhur ean qawm 'aeraduu wkdhdhabu bha?
faerd -ayha alrswl- enhm, wantazir bihim ywmana ezymana. yawm yadeu almalik bnfkhh fi "alqrn" 'iilaa 'amr fzye mnkr, wahu mawqif alhsab
